body_html:
What you're requesting is possible by setting sample_fn=tf.identity.
However it is redundant to have the unmodified outputs be the inputs in an RNN since this is already passed through as the state.
body_text:
What you're requesting is possible by setting sample_fn=tf.identity.
However it is redundant to have the unmodified outputs be the inputs in an RNN since this is already passed through as the state.
body:
What you're requesting is possible by setting sample_fn=tf.identity.
However it is redundant to have the unmodified outputs be the inputs in an RNN since this is already passed through as the state.
